name: Manaphy
flavorText:
Born on a cold seafloor, it
will swim great distances to
return to its birthplace.

previous.name: Phione
previous.flavorText:
It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it
was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

next.name: Darkrai
next.flavorText:
It can lull people to sleep and
make them dream. It is active
during nights of the new moon.
